content:
# The error indicates that I do not have any iron ore left in my inventory to insert into the stone furnace. This means I need to gather more iron ore to smelt and produce the additional iron plate required for crafting the assembling machine.

# I will locate the nearest iron ore resource patch and move there to gather more iron ore.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Locate the nearest iron ore.
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore position.

# Now, I will harvest some iron ore.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest an additional quantity of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
